linearRampToValueAtTime

linearRampToValueAtTime abstract method

AudioParam linearRampToValueAtTime(
  1. TauTime value,
  2. TauTime endTime
)

The linearRampToValueAtTime() method of the AudioParam schedules a gradual linear change in the value of the AudioParam. The change starts at the time specified for the previous event, follows a linear ramp to the new value given in the value parameter, and reaches the new value at the time given in the endTime parameter.

Implementation

AudioParam linearRampToValueAtTime(
  TauTime value,
  TauTime endTime,
);
